settings.description: We've got so many options it's spooky! So, however you like to give, we’ll help you Ghost someone…the good way. Your way.
settings.point1_text: Download and print free Ghost Giver cards. Add to anything you want and start giving. Does not include code for conﬁrmation & thank you.
settings.point2_text: Purchase pre-printed Ghost Giver cards and envelopes. Add to anything you want and start giving. Includes code for conﬁrmation and thank you.
settings.point3_text: Not sure what to give? Send something from one of our partners—like a Ghost Giver-branded Velvey. Because sending something sweet is always the right choice.
settings.point4_text: No address? No problem. If you have your recipient s cell phone number, we ll send them You ve been GHOSTED! ...the good way text with a link to your anonymous message and digital gift card.
settings.point5_text: No address? No problem. If you have your recipient s email address, w e ll send them a You ve been GHOSTED! ...the good way email with a link to your anonymous message and digital gift card.
settings.point6_text: Ghost Give from any online store that allows you to include a message —like Amazon or FTD. Purchase a Ghost Giver code here to use at checkout wherever you choose to give.
settings.point7_text: When in doubt, send cash. Choose your dollar amount (plus a little tip!) and we’ll deposit it right to a Venmo account with a spooky, “You’ve been Ghosted… the good way!”

settings.collection_content: You just need to know your recipient’s cell phone number
You just need to know your recipient’s email address
You just need to know your recipient’s mailing address
You just need to know your recipient’s @Payname

settings.collection_content2: Send anything. You do the ordering. We provide the code + instructions.
Send food. You do the ordering. We provide the code + instructions.
Include with gifts of your own. You do the delivering.
Print for free, add an anonymous note, and give. Great for kids!

settings.section_content:
We've got so many options it's spooky! So, however you like to
give, we’ll help you Ghost someone…the good way.
